duties_responsibilities.duty: Deliver field-based customer service, product repair, modification, and installation in the specified area.
Provide effective repair and first-time resolution of in-home customer repairs within an agreed area.
Advise customers on the correct operation of their products and resolve customer/product issues.
Diagnose faults with the company's range of products and rectify as required.
Maintain an up-to-date van stock of parts and safeguard parts from damage.
Inform the Technical Manager of any defects found which are out of the ordinary.
Maintain all equipment spares and tools and ensure company property and information is safeguarded at all times.

education_certification.credential: 3-5 years of appliance repair experience. Refrigeration experience a plus.
